PROJECT CONTEXT (ebay-api-fortress)
- Sources of truth (read order): `.specify/memory/constitution.md` → `docs/prime-continuity.md` → `docs/agent-handbook.md` → `AGENTS.md` → `docs/decisions.md`.
- Spec Kit workspace: `.specify/` (templates + scripts).
  - Create feature: `.specify/scripts/bash/create-new-feature.sh`
  - Setup plan: `.specify/scripts/bash/setup-plan.sh`
  - Update agent context: `.specify/scripts/bash/update-agent-context.sh`
- Tunnel implementation: `tunnel/server.mjs` and API contract `tunnel/openapi.yaml`.
  - Local URL: `http://127.0.0.1:8787`
  - Remote URL: `https://{tunnelHost}` (Cloudflare host changes per run; use latest printed).
  - Auth: `Authorization: Bearer <TOKEN>` or `X-Prime-Key: <TOKEN>`, where token is `PRIME_TUNNEL_KEY` or `TUNNEL_TOKEN` from local-only `.env.tunnel`.

WORKFLOW CONTRACT
- New behavior work: Spec Kit first (spec → plan → tasks) before significant code changes.
- Keep diffs small and focused; run `npm run check` before declaring done.
- Never leak secrets: treat `.env`, `.env.tunnel`, any `EBAY_*`, and tunnel tokens as sensitive.
- If outside-browser review/coordination is needed: require the caller to provide the current Cloudflare tunnel host and confirm auth is set; do not request token values in plain text.
